transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Yes hi good afternoon.

Customer: Hello
Executive: Haanji sir hi good afternoon. Bataiye aap se baat kar rahe sir?
Customer: A mai SA Agro Enterprise company se baat kar raha hu.
Executive: A SA Agro?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aap kaun baat kar rahe? Aap kaun baat kar rahe? Hum hum jaan sakte hai aap?
Executive: Sir mai Naveen baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Naveen sir.
Executive: Actually
Customer: Hamara koi Vijay Agrawal sahab hai jinka hamara kafi dino se baat chit chal raha tha. To unke kehne pe unke kehne pe humne IndiaMART ka hamara TrustSeal service jo hai usko
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Pehle TrustSeal tha abhi TrustSeal kar rahe hai hum shayad.
Executive: A aapne abhi SA Agro pe Maximizer liya hai sir?
Customer: Maximizer sorry Maximizer. To unka kehna jo hai ki Maximizer lene se business vgera increase hoga. Actually bahut problem hai hum unko paisa diya tha unka commitment tha ki hum aapko business laake dega. Abhi ek dedh mahina do mahina phone karke unko daily bolta hai.
Customer: Mera kuch dikhta hi nahi hai. Actually humko dikhta hi nahi hai kuch. To jaise mai dekh raha hu Sabir sir aapki service abhi 14 tarikh ko hi live hui hai. Abhi ek hafte bhi nahi hue sir service live hue aapki.
Customer: Actually sir hum 14 tarikh ka baat nahi kar rahe. Hum 14 tarikh se pehle ki pehle se hi baat kar rahe hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Abhi aap ye keh rahe hai na sir ki aap service upgrade kiye hai aur aapko business nahi mil raha. To us baat pe maine bola sir.
Customer: Haan actually to hame lagta hai ki hamara pehle Pravin sahab karke koi tha. Account manager tha. To kisi aisa humko account manager humko suggest kariye jise pata ho.
Executive: Samajh gaya. Sabir sir ek kaam kariye aap online hai abhi?
Customer: Haan 100% hai hum online.
Executive: Thik hai Sabir sir aap online rahiyega. Ranjit aapke account manager hai mere team me.
Customer: To aapko ek video meeting kara lete hai. Samne Ranjit ek ek cheez aapko guide kar denge ki aapko kaise follow karna hai kya inquiries kaise aayengi. Wo sari cheeze samjha denge aap online rahiyega thodi der me. Actually actually hum apna concern clear kar lete hai aapko. Hamara Pravin jo tha ekdam usko itna knowledge tha ki maan ke chalo hamara complaint rehta tha ki ha Pravin bhai humko inko business vgera nahi mil pa raha tha wo fatafat se hamara profile ko kuch thoda bahut changes kar leta hai jo bhi kar leta hai humko to utna knowledge nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Humko result dikhta tha.
Executive: Samajh raha hu sir.
Customer: Haan humko kuch result dikhta tha. Bataiye 1 lakh 30 hazaar rupya hum abhi market se utha ke humne idhar aapko diya hai to matlab kuch ummid hai na bhaiya humko.
Executive: Bilkul sahi keh rahe hai sir aap pareshan mat hoiye actually Ranjit ek mahina hone ko nikla hai abhi actually aapne hamara live kab me karaya 14 tarikh se lekin humne paisa kab me diya aapko?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm. Pata hai mujhe sir. To ha to at least me 10 20 hazaar ka to dhandha hona chahiye na.
Executive: Bilkul. Aap hame dilasa kyu de rahe ho? Hum hamara kehne ka matlab ye hai ki Vijay Agrawal se aap hame dilasa kyu de rahe ho? Aapne jab hame bataya tha ki Sabir sir kara lijiye upar se hame bahut pressure aa raha hai aapki vajah se hum kisi se baat kiya hai maine humko pressurize kar raha hai humko mera izzat ka sawal hai to ye sab humko bol bol ke humne bola chalo thik hai samne wala banda agar itna bol raha hai ya mere vajah se usko agar taklif ho raha hai to hum kara leta hai dusre se paisa market se uthaya aapko.
Customer: Abhi samne wala ko phone karta hai to phone thoda karta hai kya ki nahi aake barabar nahi lekin us time kitna response tha us time aaj maan ke chalo 10% response aa raha hai.
Executive: Samajh raha hu.
Customer: Nahi Sabir sir aap payment lene ke baad me aisa lagta hai ki un logo ka matlab free ho gaye wo log. Mera paisa le liya wo log free ho gaye.
Executive: Ek kaam kariye Sabir sir aap pareshan mat hoiye abhi aap online rahiye thik hai. Ranjit aapko call kar rahe hai har ek cheez jo ho sakti hai jo achi ho sakti hai aapke catalog pe us pe kaam karte hai. Aap online rahiyega to ek video meeting pe hum sara discussion kar lenge. 5 10 minute rukiye mai call karata hu. Please aap online rahiyega Sabir ji.
Customer: Thik hai ji.
Executive: Thik hai ha wait kariye call karata hu sir aapko mai. Actually mai kehna ye chahta hu hello.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ha bataiye Sabir ji. Ranjit sahab se koi bhi sahab ho aisa koi banda suggest kariye jisko pata ho jisko pata ho.
Executive: Sabir ji Ranjit ji bahut purane hai aur har ek cheez ke bare me jante hai aap aapko ye assign hue hai manager aur ye achi guide karenge to aap wait kariye mai call karata hu unse.
Customer: Nahi khali assign hone ka matlab nahi hai bhaiya. Hum aapko kehna ye chahte hai ki aaj paanch saal me hamare paas me kam se kam 100 log mera account manager tha lekin hum kisi ek bande ka naam le rahe hai Pravin Pravin.
Executive: Sabir ji ye jo Ranjit ji hai na sir ye kaam me bahut acche hai aapke profile pe aur aapka jo company hai usko aage badhane me kafi help karenge aap thoda sa wait kariye mai call karata hu sir unse.
Customer: Ha actually hame khali business se matlab hai. Bilkul sir bilkul. Wo hoga sir bilkul hoga aapko. Account jo hai ha jo jo kamiya hai wo Ranjit ji batayenge us pe aap kaam kariyega mai karata hu call aap 5 10 minute dijiye mai karata hu.
Customer: Aap busy hai bhaiya? Ha sir wo bhi abhi call karenge actually account manager wahi hai aapke to mai unse bolta hu aapse connect kar rahe hai abhi 5 10 minute me.
Customer: Thik hai. Thik hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Business not increasing after Maximizer purchase.

- Wants account manager with good knowledge.

- Dissatisfied with current support and responsiveness.



Resolution:

- Executive assured a video meeting with Ranjit.

- Executive assured Ranjit will work on catalog.

- Executive asked customer to stay online.



Next Steps: 

- Ranjit to connect with customer in 5-10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- maximizer, account manager, business, support
